reviewText: The plot of this Western is very contrived, but so what? It is still a fine effort from a great actor, Glenn Ford.
Title: Day of the Evil Gun

reviewText: This movie has it all.Fighting,shooting,cholera,yankees,rebels,indians,buried money,beautiful women,comancheros,vultures,dynamite,gunfights,mountains,deserts,waterfalls,great acting,great story,great locations,great supporting cast,in color, 95 minutes,and a 4 out of 5 transfer.And there is even a small nod to the spaghetti western...support your favorite artists,
Title: Day of the Evil Gun

reviewText: Story of a family split apart by many bad elements and then, the many trials involved for the reclamation of the females of the family from the Indians who have taken them hostage. Two men ride in search and from the outset, the end is obvious, one man is an interloper and the other is the head of the family. In the end the right man is left standing.
Title: Day of the Evil Gun

reviewerName: Patricia Bundy "bibliothec, fancy name for bo...
reviewText: Glenn Ford movies are 'my cup of tea' liked it a lot.
Title: Day of the Evil Gun

reviewText: This is a good Western starring Glenn Ford, Arthur Kennedy, Dean Jagger, John Anderson, Paul Fix, plus others! This movie is presented in Widescreen format, color and runs for about 94mins (1hr 34mins). The quality of the movies is great and I believe the movie was Remastered. Overall this is a good Western and I would recommend this.
Title: Day of the Evil Gun

reviewText: Very well made film for a western. Real good believable story with great actors. Better than the usual good guys and bad guys film.
summary: Better than the usual western with great actors + good story line. Better than the usual good guys and bad guys film.
Title: Day of the Evil Gun
